# Nico Jan - Site Identity

Site summary: nicojan.com is the UX portfolio website for Nico Jan, a UX designer and researcher based in Vancouver, BC, Canada.
Canonical owner identity: This Nico Jan is the UX designer behind nicojan.com and the educator behind classwith.nicojan.com.

Primary canonical URLs:
- https://nicojan.com/
- https://nicojan.com/about/
